meanings.definition: To create a document or image by combining photographs or other visual elements.
meanings.sent1: She photocomposed a beautiful collage for her art project.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer photocomposed the magazine cover using various images.
meanings.sent3: The cat photocomposed a hilarious meme with its photos.
meanings.sent4: Her mind photocomposed a vivid dream of a magical forest.
meanings.sent5: The artist photocomposed a stunning sunset painting in her mind.

meanings.definition: The act of using a photocomposition process to produce printed material.
meanings.sent1: The photocomposed brochure showcased the new products effectively.
meanings.sent2: The photocomposed poster caught the attention of many passersby.
meanings.sent3: The photocomposed flyer made the event look more exciting than it was.
meanings.sent4: His words were a photocomposed masterpiece, capturing the essence of the story.
meanings.sent5: The photocomposed book cover was so eye-catching that everyone wanted to read the book.
